author: Special Correspondent
text:
Communist Party of India (CPI), Puducherry unit secretary R.Viswanathan said Chief Minister N. Rangasamy had not fulfilled all the promises given during the 2011 Assembly polls.

In a release, Mr. Viswanathan said that major industrial units, including the AFT mill, were non functional.

It has landed workers in penury. Workers and employees in several Public Sector Undertakings were yet to get their wages , he alleged.
title: ‘Rangasamy has not fulfilled promises’
